pages.text:
Search this website
About ORO Facilities and More
Welcome to ORO
Clubhouse provides an activity center for our community.
Enjoy swimming in one of our two heated pools!
Our free, 9-hole par-3 golf course waits for you.
Mini golf is fun for the whole family.
Lighted tennis and pickleball courts provide hours of fun.
Shuffleboard with recently updated surfaces.
Bocce ball anyone?
Horseshoe pits are ready for you.
Bath houses with beautiful artwork provide services throughout the park.
Outdoor Resorts at Orlando (near Highway 192 and 27) is a 55+ community with RV lots and Park Model homes. Our resort is located in the Four Corners area, only 6 miles from Walt Disney World’s main gate. On the shore of Lake Davenport, the resort provides many amenities for guests and full-time residents:
Gated community with guard house staffed 24 hours/day, 7 days/week
Free 9-hole, par 3 executive golf course
Miniature golf course
2 heated swimming pools
1 heated kiddie pool and a children’s playground
Private boat ramp and marina on Lake Davenport
Lighted tennis and pickleball courts
Shuffleboard
Bocce ball court
Horseshoe pits
Two-story clubhouse with Wifi available
8 bath houses with showers (equipped with AEDs)
Many planned events and activities, such as card games, BINGO, and dances
Laundry facilities
Propane service
Community mail room
Lending library with books and puzzles
Fenced dog run
Cable television, water/sewer, and lawncare provided for owners
ORO Information on TV
Channel 997 provides information about activities, events, and helpful hints for our resort and the local area. These slides are created and maintained by the ORO office staff. If you have an activity to include in these slides, please contact the ORO office.
Weather at Outdoor Resorts
The latest disneyworld-dvc information weather

Search this website
Property Owners in Outdoor Resorts
As an owner in Outdoor Resorts at Orlando (ORO), you are an important part of our community. With 979 properties, ORO brings together people from around the world and allows you to find friends and enjoy many different activities. Some residents live here all year, while others come to enjoy our piece of paradise for several months each year.
Outdoor Resorts at Orlando is a condominium, with quarterly dues to support our park operations and the many facilities we have to support all our amenities. Our Board of Directors and park staff work together to create a positive environment and maintain our beautiful community. Each owner also receives cable TV, water/sewer, and lawn care. Through careful management, ORO is able to keep our dues low for the number of amenities offered.
This section of the website provides access to important information for ORO property owners.
Log In for Access
Request an Account
Note:
If you are an owner and you are having problems accessing this site, or you would like to register to use this site, please email your full name, lot#, and email address to the
ORO Webmaster
.
***************************************
Facebook Groups and Pages
ORO provides several great ways to stay informed and connected to our community, including an owner email list, OROAlerts on Twitter and Threads, a Facebook page, and a private Facebook group. For more information about all these systems, see the
ORO Communication Systems
page.
The
@OutdoorResortsOrlando
Facebook page is the
public page
for our community. This page provides photos and highlights for anyone who is looking for public information about Outdoor Resorts at Orlando.
The
ORO Community
Facebook
private group
allows unit owners and long-term renters to share positive information about the Outdoor Resorts at Orlando community and the surrounding area. This private group is managed by a group of ORO unit owners who enjoy sharing positivity and helping others get the correct answers to their questions. If you own a unit in ORO or you are a long-term renter, you can go to
facebook.com/groups/orocommunity
and request to join the group.

Search this website
Candidates for ORO Board – 2025 Election
January 27, 2025
As the 2025 ORO Annual Meeting approaches, we can become familiar with the candidates who have submitted their intent to be a candidate form. At this meeting, owners will elect
five
owners to join the ORO Board for a two-year term.
ORO will also hold a Candidates Night on Tuesday, 4 February 2025, starting at 7pm in the Clubhouse Upstairs. During this meeting, the 11 candidates will share their thoughts on questions asked by the moderator and owners.
Note:
If you are interested, you can also view
the 2024 Candidate Bios
page.
Charles Alexander
Bio (PDF)
John Bailey
Bio (PDF)
Ron Durkin
Bio (PDF)
Carol Fuller
Bio (PDF)
Roselle Howerter
Bio (PDF)
Dawn Jackson
Bio (PDF)

Bio (PDF)

Bio (PDF)

Bio (PDF)

Bio (PDF)
Filed Under:
Annual Meetings
,
Owner Information

Search this website
Entertainment & Events
The Events and Entertainment Committee at Outdoor Resorts organizes some incredible events each year. These events bring our community together and give everyone the opportunity to visit with each other and meet new friends.
Entertainment Schedule
Entertainment Articles
ORO is an active community with so much for you to explore:
Events by the EE Committee
Activities
Games and Meetings
More Items to Enjoy
Events by the EE Committee
BINGO
: BINGO starts at the end of October and is hosted Fridays in the clubhouse upstairs.
Blood Drive
: The Blood Bus comes to the ORO clubhouse parking lot in November, January, and March.
Driveway Sale
: Three times throughout the year, owners throughout the park host “yard sales” on their driveways.
Entertainment Nights
: These nights include dances, music, dinners, and entertainers.
ORO Breakfast
: This breakfast, hosted monthly during the busy season, brings members from our community together.
Travel Trips
: From 1-day trips to multiple-day adventures, join the fun with these fun-loving groups of ORO community members.
Activities
Church Services
: Every Sunday (November through April) at 8:30am in the clubhouse upstairs.
Cornhole
: Every Wednesday 1pm to 3pm, during the busy season, in front of the clubhouse. Everyone is welcome!
Golf
: Golfers are meeting in the parking lot by Number 1 Green at 9:30am. Remember to stay six feet apart and stay safe! If you want a certain captain, please arrive with him/her. Currently only playing best ball. MAX 36 PEOPLE.
Horseshoes
: Tuesdays and Thursdays 9:30am to 12pm.
Pickleball & Tennis
: We meet each day (Mon-Sat) to play Pickleball & Tennis. We trade days with one in the morning and the other in the afternoon. For more information, see the
Calendar of Events and Activities
.
Pickleball Beginner Clinic
: Learn to play a physically active sport for a healthy lifestyle. Contact Don V (lot 341) to schedule your time!
Shuffleboard
: Meeting daily at 8:50am! New players are welcome! Social distancing will be followed and equipment sanitized.
Games and Meetings
Many groups host games and meetings in the first floor of the clubhouse. From bridge to poker and many other popular games, please come and join the fun. The scheduled times are added to the
Calendar
as meetings are scheduled.
More Items for You to Enjoy
Swimming Pools
: The pools are open 10am-10pm. Please allow the pool cleaners to finish before entering pool.
Library
: The Library is available when the Clubhouse Downstairs is open. Books and puzzles are available from our lending library.
Produce Wagon
: The Produce Wagon parks on 192 near our entrance (not on ORO property) on Saturdays and Sundays approximately 10-6 for your convenience.

Search this website
Calendar of Activities and Events
This page provides the comprehensive calendar of
All ORO activities and events
. This calendar is maintained as multiple, merged Google Calendars to help us view and share information. If your activities are not shown on the calendar, please contact the
Katie Williams
.
Notes:
If you want to reserve the Clubhouse Downstairs or a common activity area, please see
Schedule Request: Clubhouse Downstairs and Sports Courts
.
If you want to reserve the Clubhouse Upstairs, please contact Kevin & Cathy Martyn, and submit a
Clubhouse Upstairs Request Form
through the ORO Office.
Pickleball/Tennis
courts open at 7am May 1 through Oct 31. The courts open at 8am Nov 1 through Apr 30.
Water Exercise
groups often meet Monday through Friday at each of the pools (Big Pool: 9-10am) when members of the groups are able to attend. This activity is not on the calendar when the group leaders are not here on a regular basis. Contact one of the leaders to join the text/email list if you would like to attend the Water Exercises with other group members.

About ORO Facilities and More
Welcome to ORO
Clubhouse provides an activity center for our community.
Enjoy swimming in one of our two heated pools!
Our free, 9-hole par-3 golf course waits for you.
Mini golf is fun for the whole family.
Lighted tennis and pickleball courts provide hours of fun.
Shuffleboard with recently updated surfaces.
Bocce ball anyone?
Horseshoe pits are ready for you.
Bath houses with beautiful artwork provide services throughout the park.
Outdoor Resorts at Orlando (near Highway 192 and 27) is a 55+ community with RV lots and Park Model homes. Our resort is located in the Four Corners area, only 6 miles from Walt Disney World’s main gate. On the shore of Lake Davenport, the resort provides many amenities for guests and full-time residents:
Gated community with guard house staffed 24 hours/day, 7 days/week
Free 9-hole, par 3 executive golf course
Miniature golf course
2 heated swimming pools
1 heated kiddie pool and a children’s playground
Private boat ramp and marina on Lake Davenport
Lighted tennis and pickleball courts
Shuffleboard
Bocce ball court
Horseshoe pits
Two-story clubhouse with Wifi available
8 bath houses with showers (equipped with AEDs)
Many planned events and activities, such as card games, BINGO, and dances
Laundry facilities
Propane service
Community mail room
Lending library with books and puzzles
Fenced dog run
Cable television, water/sewer, and lawncare provided for owners
ORO Information on TV
Channel 997 provides information about activities, events, and helpful hints for our resort and the local area. These slides are created and maintained by the ORO office staff. If you have an activity to include in these slides, please contact the ORO office.

Form: Intent to Be Candidate for Board
November 14, 2024
This form allows an ORO owner to submit their intent to be a candidate for the Board of Directors.
To run for the Board of Directors at the March 2025 Annual Meeting, you must give written notice to the  Association office of your intent to be a candidate no later than January 21, 2025, by the close of  business at 3:00pm. This form is available for your convenience. You can also submit a one page Candidate Information Sheet, that contains your qualifications and/or platform for office. For more information, see
Form: Candidate Information Sheet
.
PDF of 2025 Board Candidate Intent Form
